Submodules¶

kedro_tutorial.pipelines.data_science.nodes module¶

This is a boilerplate pipeline ‘data_science’ generated using Kedro 0.18.3

kedro_tutorial.pipelines.data_science.nodes.evaluate_model(regressor, X_test, y_test)[source]¶

Calculates and logs the coefficient of determination.

Parameters

  • regressor (LinearRegression) – Trained model.

  • X_test (DataFrame) – Testing data of independent features.

  • y_test (Series) – Testing data for price.

kedro_tutorial.pipelines.data_science.nodes.split_data(data, parameters)[source]¶

Splits data into features and targets training and test sets.

Parameters

  • data (DataFrame) – Data containing features and target.

  • parameters (Dict) – Parameters defined in parameters/data_science.yml.

Return type

Tuple

Returns

Split data.

kedro_tutorial.pipelines.data_science.nodes.train_model(X_train, y_train)[source]¶

Trains the linear regression model.

Parameters

  • X_train (DataFrame) – Training data of independent features.

  • y_train (Series) – Training data for price.

Return type

LinearRegression

Returns

Trained model.
